messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: Hi there! How can I help you today?

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: Machine learning is a subset of AI that enables computers to learn from data without explicit programming.

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you doing?

messages.speaker: user
messages.text: Can you help me with Python?

messages.text: Of course! I'd be happy to help you with Python. What specific topic would you like to learn about?

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: PyTorch is an open-source machine learning library for Python, known for its dynamic computation graphs and ease of use.

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: You're welcome! Feel free to ask if you have any more questions.
